Name: Aerofoil Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence and improves resistance to wind (Woosh Ward trait).

Name: Aerofoil Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Woosher trait.

Name: Alarming Amulet
Description: Slightly increase defence (+10) and improves resistance to sleep (Insomniac trait).

Name: Amulet of Clarity
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to confusion (Clear Thinker trait).

Name: Amulet of Immunity
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to poison (Antioxidant trait).

Name: Amulet of Vigour
Description: Slightly increases defence and improves resistance to stun (Granite Chin trait).

Name: Antidotal Herb
Description: Cures a single ally of poison and severe poison

Name: Anti-Freeze Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to ice (Crack Ward trait).

Name: Anti-Freeze Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack (+10) and adds effects of the Crafty Cracker trait.

Name: Antimagic Powder
Description: Prevents a single enemy from using magic spells.

Name: Asbestos Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to fire (Frizz Ward trait).

Name: Asbestos Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Frizzer trait.

Name: Bad Medicine
Description: Inflicts a single enemy with a range of debilitating effects.

Name: Blast-Proof Amulet+
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to explosions (Bang Ward trait).

Name: Blast-Proof Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack (+10) and adds effects of the Crafty Banger trait.

Name: Blast-Proof Earrings
Description: Increase defence (+40) and improve resistance to explosions (Bang Ward trait).

Name: Care Ring
Description: Increases defence (+30), and automatically restores the wearer's HP (Auto-Restora trait).

Name: Concrete Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence and improves resistance to earth (Crag Ward trait).

Name: Concrete Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Cragger trait.

Name: Cupcake Cane
Description: Slightly increases the amount of gold coins (Gold Panner = +0.1x) and experience points (Iota of Experience = +0.1x) earned by defeating an enemy, as well as improving the likelihood of obtaining an item (Rummager = Unknown).

Name: Demon's Ring
Description: Increases attack (+30) and agility (+30), and raises the likelihood of performing critical hits (Critical Favourite trait).

Name: Endurance Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to instant death (Death Defier trait).

Name: Full Moon Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence and improves resistance to paralysis (Fidget trait).

Name: Glow-in-the-Dark Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to dark (Zam Ward trait).

Name: Glow-in-the-Dark Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack (+10) and adds effects of the Crafty Zammer trait.

Name: Glow-in-the-Dark Belt+
Description: Slightly increases attack (+20) and adds effects of the Crafty Zammer trait.

Name: Hermit's Girdle
Description: Slightly increases attack (+15), agility (+15) and max. HP (+15).

Name: Hero's Cloak
Description: Increases max. HP (+30) very slightly increases attack (+10) and defence (+10). Also improves resistance to explosions (Bang Ward), ice (Crack Ward) and fire (Frizz Ward).

Name: Hocus Pocus Ring
Notes: Adds a chance for accessory tinkering to make a totally different accessory, including two exclusives to this mechanic - the Rational Ring and the Tingly Ring

Name: Hocus Pocus Ring+
Notes: Adds a chance for accessory tinkering to make a totally different accessory, including two exclusives to this mechanic - the Rational Ring and the Tingly Ring

Name: Leather Collar
Description: Very slightly increases attack (+10), defence (+10) and max. HP (+10).

Name: Mage's Ring
Description: Very slightly increases wisdom (+10) and max. MP (+10), and raises the likelihood of casting critical spells (Critical Thinker trait).

Name: Magic Water
Description: Restores 30 MP to a single ally.

Name: Manky Meat
Description: A piece of putrid flesh that exudes a sour stench. Feed to a monster to very slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you, but also poison it in the process.

Name: Master Thief's Monocle
Description: Very slightly increases agility (+10), wisdom (+10) and max. MP (+10).

Name: Medicinal Herb
Description: Restores 30 HP to a single ally.

Name: Mini Medal
Description: Collectible medals that can be swapped with the medallist for an array of prizes. Drop by their counter in the Maulosseum in the lower echelon of the Circle of Conquest to see what's on offer.

Name: Mirror Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to light (Sizz Ward trait).

Name: Mirror Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Sizzer trait.

Name: Monster Manure
Description: A pongy deposit that can be pitched at one's opponents. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle.

Name: Monster Munchies
Description: A meaty morsel that monsters love. Feed to a mosnter to very slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.

Name: Moonwort Bulb
Description: Cures a single ally of paralysis.

Name: Mystery Meat
Description: Suspicious meat of unknown origin. Feed to a monster to increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you by a random factor.

Name: Oomph Powder
Description: Greatly increases the attack of a single ally for 2 to 5 turns.

Name: Panacea
Description: Cures a single ally of any ailments that afflict them.

Name: Pickpocket's Poncho
Description: Slightly increases agility (+15), wisdom (+15) and max. MP (+15).

Name: Pinball
Description: A sphere of the toughest stone that really hurts if it hits you. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle, including metallic monsters.

Name: Pretty Pebble
Description: A small stone that can sting quite sharply if thrown with enough force. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle.

Name: Priest's Ring
Description: Very slightly increases wisdom (+10) and max. MP (+10), and automatically restores the wearer's MP (Auto-Cadabra trait).

Name: Rarified Steak
Description: Odd offcuts, the origin of which amy never be ascertained. Feed to a mosnter to increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you by a random factor. Occasionally inflicts a status ailment.

Name: Red Travelite
Description: A red crystal that was forged by the ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

Name: Rockbomb Shard
Description: An unstable stone that explodes when it strikes its target. Almost kills a single enemy when used in battle, but the damage it inflicts will vary according to the target's resistance to instance death.

Name: Rubber Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to electricity (Zap Ward trait).

Name: Rubber Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Zapper trait.

Name: Scavenger's Badge
Description: Slightly improves the likehlihood of acquiring items (Scavenger = Unknown) after defeating an enemy.

Name: Scavenger's Medal
Description: Improves the likehlihood of acquiring items (Hoarder = Unknown) after defeating an enemy.

Name: Scout's Badge
Description: Improves the likelihood of a show of Force succeeding

Name: Scuba Earrings
Description: Slightly increase defence (+10) and improve resistance to water (Splish Ward trait) and dark (Zam Ward trait).

Name: Seed of Agility
Description: Raises the agility of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its agility that cannot be exceeded.

Name: Seed of Life
Description: Raises the max. HP of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. HP that cannot be exceeded.

Name: Seed of Magic
Description: Raises the max. MP of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. MP that cannot be exceeded.

Name: Seed of Resilience
Description: Raises the defence of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its defence that cannot be exceeded.

Name: Seed of Skill
Description: Provides a single ally with 3 additional talent points. Note that a monster can have a maximum of 999 available talent points.

Name: Seed of Strength
Description: Raises the attack of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its attack that cannot be exceeded.

Name: Seed of Wisdom
Description: Raises the wisdom of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster has an upper limit to its wisdom that cannot be exceeded.

Name: Seer's Ring
Description: Increases agility (+30) and max. MP (+30), and raises evasion (Artful Dodger trait).

Name: Seer's Ring+
Description: Increases agility (+40) and max. MP (+30), and raises evasion (Artful Dodger trait).

Name: Silver Tiara
Description: Very slightly increases defence (+10), wisdom (+10) and max. MP (+10).

Name: Single Phial
Description: Restores 10 MP to a single ally.

Name: Smelling Salts
Description: Cures a single ally of confusion and sleep.

Name: Smoked Sirloin
Description: A tender treat that monsters adore. Feed to a monster to slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.

Name: Stardust Earrings
Description: Very slightly increases defence (+10), agility (+10) and max. HP (+10).

Name: Strong Medicine
Description: Restores 60 HP to a single ally.

Name: Trainee's Badge
Description: Slightly increases the amount of experience earned (Modicum of Experience = +0.3x).

Name: Trainee's Medal
Description: Increases the amount of experience earned (Wealth of Experience = +0.5x).

Name: Warrior's Ring
Description: Very slightly increases attack (+10) and defence (+10), and automatically restores the wearer's HP (Auto-Restora trait).

Name: Waterproof Amulet
Description: Slightly increases defence (+10) and improves resistance to water (Splish Ward trait).

Name: Waterproof Armband
Description: Increase attack (+40) and adds effects of the Crafty Splasher trait (Crafty Splasher trait).

Name: Waterproof Belt
Description: Slightly increases attack and adds effects of the Crafty Splasher trait.

Name: Witch's Brooch
Description: Slightly increases max. MP (+10) and reduces MP consumption (Castslasher trait).

Name: Yellow Travelite
Description: A yellow crystal that was forged by the ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

Name: Yggdrasil Leaf
Description: Revives a single fallen ally and restores half of their HP.
